short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates the name of a Git branch from a Jira Ticket.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension creates a button that creates a Git-valid branch name based on the JIRA ticket number and description, then copies it to your clipboard for ease of use in Git.
